Translations.Text: Em
Tarusi s$uo Uenin Ipeunun
Tazmamt, feuulen issekniyen is; Leqwoan s taaoabt, i ugdud issnen
ipbeccioen, ineddoen. Tegwti degsen numren, d$a ur sellen
Nnan: "ulawen nne$ ddurin i wayen i$eo la $ tneccdev; di tmejjin nne$: tiaeegt; garane$ yidek: sieo. Ihi, exdem, nekwni la nxeddem
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d kan ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Sweqmet $uoeS, ssutret aS ssmae". A tawa$it n imcurak
wid ur nepzekki, u nitni nekoen laxeot
Ih, i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan: arraz ur nepnegzay
Ini: "kunwi aql akwen la tnekoem Win Ixelqen tamurt, di sin wussan. La S tepparam nned. Wagi d Mass imavalen
Irra degs idurar sufella. Ioqa p, Iwzen degs tagwella s, di kue wussan. Akka i wid isteqsayen
Sinna, Izzi ar igenni i illan d abbu. Inna yas, u i tmurt: "aset ed, teb$am ne$ tugim"! Nnan: "a n nas, d imvuaen
Iseyya ten d ua igenwan, di sin wussan. Iweeea lameo is, i yal igenni. Ncebbee igenni aqoib mavi, s teftilin, u d laanaya. D aya ay d Iqeddeo n Uzmir, Amusnaw
Ma numren, ini: "ssagwde$ kwen s ssiaqa, am ssiaqa n Aad u Tamud
Mi ten id usan imazanen, zdat sen, u deffir sen: "ur aabdet, siwa Oebbi"! Nnan: "lemmer i S ihwi i Mass nne$, a d Issers lmalayek. Nekwni, ihi, nenkeo ayen i s id teppuceggaam
Wanag Aad, sme$woen iman nnsen di tmurt, ur klalen. Nnan: "anwa i $ i$elben di tezmert"? Day ur walan ara, Oebbi, iten id Ixelqen, I$elb iten di tezmert? Llan la nekoen issekniyen nne£
Nuzen asen aueouao, deg ussan imevyaoen, iwakken a Nessukk fellasen, aaaqeb imdelli di tmeddurt n ddunit. Aaaqeb n laxeot, war ccekk, isdullu kteo. Ur asen ippili umaiwen
Wanag Tamud, Nebbwi ten d ubrid. Smenyafen tider$elt i nnhaya. Tewwet iten ssiaqa n uaaqeb issrusun, ilmend n wayen keppben
Nsellek wid iumnen, i illan peezziben
Ass ideg ara ssemlilen ar tmessi, icenga n Oebbi, nitni ad pwajemmlen
Alamma, mara awven $uoes, ad cehhden fellasen, $ef wayen xeddmen, imeeeu$en nnsen, allen nnsen, d igwelman nnsen
Ad inin i igwelman nnsen: "acimi id tcuhhdem fella$"? A d inin: "Issenieq a$ d Oebbi, id Issentaqen yal cci. Neppa, Ixelq ikwen tikelt tamezwarut, u $uoeS ara tu$alem
Ur tezmirem ara a ppeffrem, ur cehhden fellawen imeeeu$en nnwen, allen nnwen, akked igwelman nnwen. Maca, t$ilem ur Ieeo ara Oebbi, aias n wayen txeddmem
Akka ameyyez nnwen $ef Mass nnwen. Isqucc ikwen, tegwram d d imexsuoen
Xas ueboen, di tmes ara zed$en. Ma ssutren ssmae, ur llin d wid ara ipwaqeblen
Nefka yasen imeddukwal i sen icebbeen ayen illan zdat sen, akked wayen illan deffir sen. Iuao fellasen wawal ger leoyus n yimdanen akw n leonun, i i$aben, uqbel nnsen. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur ssemeaset i Leqwoan agi. Ssekret fellas, ta$wegwa, ahat a prebeem
A Nessukk $ef wid ijehlen, aaaqeb uqsie. A ten Nqeiii sennig wayen xeddmen
D wagi ay d aqeiii icenga n Oebbi: times; i nitni degs axxam n lebda; d aqeiii, imi la nekoen issekniyen nne£
Ad inin, wid ijehlen: "a Mass nne$! Essken a$ wid i $ i$elien, d loenn ne$ d amdan; a ten neokev, ad u$alen seg wid indellen mavi
Ih, wid innan: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi", sinna, nudan lewqama, a d rsent $uosen lmalayek: "ur ppagwadet, ur $webblet; ppubeccoet s Loennet i wen ippuwaaaden
Nekwni d imawlan nnwen di tmeddurt n ddunit u di laxeot. Dinna, i kunwi, ayen i cedhant teowiein nnwen. Dinna, i kunwi, ayen tessutrem
D tarusi s$uo Win Ipsemmieen, Ipeunun
Anwa yifen awal umain n win inaaoen Oebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, id innan: "nek, ih, seg imvuaen
Ur iaadil ise$ akked tucmip. Err ip akin, s wayen ip yifen. Ma tella cceena, garak d yiwen, ad iu$al d aebib i k ieemmlen
Ur teppunefk siwa i wid iuebboen. Ur teppunefk, siwa i bu sser abarar
Ma iccacev ak Cciian tuccva, ssuter laanaya n Oebbi. Ih, Neppa d win Isellen, d Amusnaw
Seg issekniyen iS, ass akked yiv, iiij akked waggur. Ur kennut ara i yiiij, ne$ i waggur. Knut i Oebbi, iten id Ixelqen, ma d Neppa ay taabbdem
Ma zuxxen, ihi, wid illan ar Mass ik, sbuccuaen T iv akked wass, ur aaggun
Seg issekniyen iS: a pwaliv, kecc, akal iqquo; lemmer ad as Nesse$li aman, a d iakwi, ad icuff. Win it id Issadren, d Win ara d Issidren lmeggtin. Ih, Neppa, Izmer i yal cci
Ih, wid issexuaoen issekniyen nne£, ur drigen fellane£. Menyif win ara ipwaveggoen ar tmes, ne$ win ara iasen di laman, ass n tnekra? Xedmet ayen i wen ihwan. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Akka, wid inekoen asmekti, mi ten id iusa, u neppat ard Tazmamt tuzmirt
Ur d iusi le$wlav zdat es, ne$ deffir es. D tarusi s$uo Bab n uuwab, Amaazuz
Awal i k id iusan, d win kan id iusan imazanen, uqbel ik. Mass ik, ih, ard Bab n ssmae, d Bab uaaqeb aqeoean

Lemmer Nerri Leqwoan s tmeslayt tabeooanit, a d inin: "lemmer feuulen issekniyen iS s wawal abeooani, u s taaoabt"? Ini: "neppa, i wid iumnen, d nnhaya u d ccafuaa. Wid ur numin ara, aaegent tmejjin nnsen. Neppa, i nitni, d tider$elt. Widak pwanecden seg umkan ibaaden
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa. Mgarraden fellas. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal s$uo Mass ik, yili tefra garasen. Nitni, fellas, di ccekk imcebbwel
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win iccven, mgal iman is. Mass ik ur Idennis ara imdanen

£uoeS ay tella tmusni n yimir. Ur d iteffe$ uzway si txeddact is, ur treffed nnta tadist, ur tepparew, siwa ma Ieoa. Ass ideg ar asen Isiwel: "anda ten icriken iW"? A d inin: "ad aK nini, ur illi garane$ unagi
Iooa ten wayen u$uo pnujun zik. Fehmen, ur asen illi ssoan
Ur ifeccel ara umdan di tuppra n lxio. Ma inul it lqeoe, ad iayes, ad innu$ben

Ma Nseeess as aeunu nne£, deffir ccqa i t ieuzan, war ccekk, ad yini: "ayagi inu. Ur cukke$ ara imir a d ias. Ma bbwve$ s afus n Mass iw, ad afe$ $uoeS uuam". Ih, a Nbeggen ayen xedmen, i wid ijehlen, u, ih, ad Nsaaddi fellasen aaaqeb iwaaoen
Ma N$at amdan ad iwexxeo, izzi akin. Ma ieuza t leif, ad ipnuju, irennu
Ini: "tmeyyzem ma iusa d s$uo Oebbi, u kunwi tnekoem t"? Anwa innetlafen sennig win illan di ticuina tu$miqt
Ad asen Nessken issekniyen nne£ di tmurt akked igenwan, u deg iman nnsen, alamma pputebbten ar neppa d tidep. Day ur Iqadd ara Mass ik mi Neppa, war ccekk, d Anagi n yal cci
Day, s tidep, cukken timlilit d Mass nnsen? Day Neppa, s tidep, ur Izzi ara i yal cci
